description: Develop and maintain websites of various types, including landing pages, profile websites, blogs, online stores, and LMS platforms.
Use a variety of tools and technologies for front-end development.
Work with Wordpress and Elementor to create user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces.
Integrate APIs into websites to create dynamic and interactive user experiences.
Translate designs from Adobe XD and Figma into functional websites.
Collaborate with clients to ensure their website needs are met and exceeded.
Develop and maintain front-end code for various websites, ensuring highquality and responsive design.
Collaborate with other developers and designers to create user-friendly and visually appealing interfaces.
Troubleshoot and fix issues related to front-end code.
Stay up-to-date with the latest front-end development technologies.
Work without the use of any JS framework.
